p: We compared the mRNA abundance of 17,580 protein-coding genes (passing a low-count filter) of 29 PD to 44 control prefrontal cortex samples (see Table 1 for sample description). A total of 1095 genes (6.2 %) were identified with significantly different mRNA levels at FDR p-values < 0.05, with 570 of these genes (52.1 %) showing increased RNA level in PD compared with controls (Fig. 2 and Additional file 3: Table S3).
